Container.Name: StirlingPDF
Container.Overview:
Stirling PDF (S-PDF) SPDF is a locally hosted web application that allows you to perform various operations on PDF files, such as merging, splitting and converting PDFs and more advanced features like OCR and compression
Additional unraid docker settings in advanced section if required The majority of variable settings override any settings in /configs/settings.yml You can edit setting there instead of using docker variables if you want (You would need to remove them from docker to avoid override)
Container.DonateText: You shouldn't donate, I have not made these docker images only did some config.. But if you really want to, thanks :)

Config.Name: SYSTEM_GOOGLEVISIBILITY
Config.Description: 'true' to allow Google visibility (via robots.txt), 'false' to disallow

Config.Name: DOCKER_ENABLE_SECURITY
Config.Description: true to enable login and authentication functionality (uses additional resources)

Config.Name: SYSTEM_ROOT_URI_PATH
Config.Description: changes the websites root path, ie if set to pdf-app to application will be viewable at address localhost:8080/pdf-app instead of localhost:8080/
